title: LBJ Memorial Grove on the Potomac: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       The Lyndon Baines Johnson Memorial Grove on the Potomac makes a great classroom! With such diverse human and natural history, you are guaranteed to find a place in the park with landforms, wildlife, or historic resources that will bring your curriculum to life.      Plan A Field Trip If you have questions about park facilities or would like to request a ranger for your field trip call 703‑289‑2553.      Gallaudet Internships Rangers are looking for 5-10 students for paid internships. Interns will learn about LBJ's civil rights legacy and create a digital media product to share with the public.
